name: pluggedin-mcp-proxy
title: Plugged.in Proxy
description: A unified MCP proxy that aggregates multiple MCP servers into one interface, enabling seamless tool discovery and management across all your AI interactions. Manage all your MCP servers from a single connection point with RAG capabilities and real-time notifications.

config.name: pluggedin-mcp-proxy
config.description: Configure your Plugged.in API connection. Get your API key from https://plugged.in in the API Keys section.

pluggedin_api_base_url.description: Base URL for the Plugged.in API (optional, defaults to https://plugged.in for cloud or http://localhost:12005 for self-hosted)
